snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Talk On The Phone About Getting Violent
snippet.description:
#JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #lawsuit

Two of the beautiful people have it out as actor Johnny Depp and his wife, actress Amber Heard, try to talk through their marriage problems in this audio snippet allegedly recorded on Heard’s cellphone in 2015. Heard apparently talked about her violent tantrums in a series of taped conversations that this audio was clipped from. “I can't promise I won't get physical again; I get so mad I lose it,” Heard seems to say as she appears to admit to hitting Depp and pelting him with pots, pans, and vases. Depp and Heard have been in and out of court because of their stormy relationship and the press accounts about it.
